short_summary: Temporary personnel services to support the Department of National Defense (DND) in the National Capital Region (NCR)
description: This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following streams and categories: 9.1 Materiel Management The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:\\n3056058 Canada inc. \\nAction Personnel of Ottawa-Hull Ltd \\nAdirondack Information Management Inc. \\nAltis Recruitment & Technology Inc. \\nCache Computer Consulting Corp. \\nDare Human Resources Corporation \\nGartner Canada Co. \\nMaverin Inc. \\nOLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE \\nPortage Personnel Inc. \\nSpirit Personnel Inc. \\nTDV Global inc. \\nThe AIM Group Inc. \\nThinkpoint Inc. \\nTurtle Island Staffing Inc. \\nDescription of the Requirement:\\nDepartment of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.\\nLevel of Security Requirement:\\nResource(s) Minimum Security Level Required is\/are: Secret
duration_in_months: You must agree to the period of estimated duration of 9  months instead of 10, as we do not want the contract extended beyond the initial 10 months, as you cannot ask for an extension, but we do want to have an window for the contract to be extended.
full_summary:
National Supply and Procurement Program – 9.1 Materiel Management Services for the National Capital Region (NCR)
=====================================================

Tender Information
-----------------

* **Solicitation Number**: S4825493
* **Reference Number**: cb-383-3867726
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Publication Date**: February 16, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 23, 2024 @ 1:00 PM (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 4, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: January 31, 2025

Contract Details
-----------------

* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Trade Agreements**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

Description
------------

The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services under 9.1 Materiel Management. The services are required for the National Capital Region (NCR).

Eligible Suppliers
-----------------

The following supply arrangement holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 3056058 Canada inc.
* Action Personnel of Ottawa-Hull Ltd
* Adirondack Information Management Inc.
* Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* Dare Human Resources Corporation
* Gartner Canada Co.
* Maverin Inc.
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP. and MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION (Joint Venture)
* Portage Personnel Inc.
* Spirit Personnel Inc.
* TDV Global Inc.
* The AIM Group Inc.
* Thinkpoint Inc.
* Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

Security Clearance
----------------

A minimum security level of Secret is required for this service.

Attachments
------------

The tender notice and proposal package can be downloaded from [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32196/s4825493---rfp.pdf).

**Contact Information:**

* CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-G
